fields.title: The Shawshank Redemption
fields.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
fields.cast: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton

fields.title: The Godfather
fields.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
fields.cast: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan

fields.title: The Dark Knight
fields.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
fields.cast: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart

fields.title: Pulp Fiction
fields.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
fields.cast: John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson

fields.title: Inception
fields.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.
fields.cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page

fields.title: Forrest Gump
fields.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.
fields.cast: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise

fields.title: The Matrix
fields.description: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.
fields.cast: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss

fields.title: Parasite
fields.description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.
fields.cast: Song Kang-ho, Lee Sun-kyun, Cho Yeo-jeong

fields.title: Avengers: Endgame
fields.description: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.
fields.cast: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo

fields.title: Joker
fields.description: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.
fields.cast: Joaquin Phoenix, Robert De Niro, Zazie Beetz
